danish_publication: I gamle dage var der én, der havde hængt sig i Rold skov. Knægtene de gik jo og var hjorder der omkring ligesom andre steder, og så skulde de til at at prøve på også at hænge dem. Den, der var oppe at hænge, den skulde de andre da hjælpe ned. Men de gjorde den aftale med ham, at han skulde ikke ned, inden han havde ladt sit vand. Så havde der været tre oppe at hænge, men da den fjerde kommer op, så kommer der en kok, der var spændt for et stort læs hø. Alle de andre de faldt i forundring over det syn, og de glemte at få ham ned, te han hængte og kvollest.
english_publication: In the old days, there was one who had hung himself in Rold forest. The boys went and worked as shepherds just like in other places, and then they wanted to try hanging themselves. The one who was up hanging, the others were supposed to help down. But they made an agreement with him, that they weren't supposed to let him down until he'd made his water. So, three had been up hanging, but when the fourth was up hanging, a rooster comes by, pulling a large load of hay. All of the others fell down in amazement at that sight, and they forgot to get him down, and so he hung and died.

etk_index.heading_danish: Om Fanden og forbund med ham
etk_index.heading_english: About the Devil and being in league with the Devil
